headline.main: Suicide Attack Against Shiites Kills at Least 22 in Southern Pakistan

byline.contributor: Zia ur-Rehman contributed reporting from Karachi, Pakistan.

snippet: There were no immediate claims of responsibility, but Sunni insurgents are believed to be behind the bomb attack, which struck a Shiite procession.
abstract: Pakistani officials say suicide bomb attack on Shiite Muslims in southern city of Jacobabad killed at least 22 people and wounded at least 20 others.
lead_paragraph: There were no immediate claims of responsibility, but Sunni insurgents are believed to be behind the bomb attack, which struck a Shiite procession.
